wikipedia_page.main: James Alfred Davidson, OBE (22 March 1921 – May 2004) was a British naval commander and diplomat. After serving during the Second World War, he joined the Commonwealth Relations Office where he held several posts in Cambodia, Brunei, Bangladesh and the British Virgin Islands.
